info.name: Knowledge Management Service API
info.description: updated API collection for the AI Knowledge Management Service

request.description: Get welcome message from the API

response.name: Welcome
response.body: Welcome to Knowledge Management Service Powered by AI!

request.description: Upload a document for processing. Supports PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, HTML, PPT, PPTX, RTF, ODT, ODP formats.

response.name: List All Documents
response.body:
{
    "documents": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "filename": "01-machine-learning-introduction.txt",
            "contentType": "text/plain",
            "fileSize": 2200,
            "processingStatus": "COMPLETED",
            "summary": "Machine Learning: An Introduction Machine Learning (ML) is a subset of artificial intelligence that focuses on building systems that can learn from and make decisions based on data.",
            "uploadedAt": "2025-12-04T21:38:16.789968",
            "updatedAt": "2025-12-04T21:38:43.662451"
        },
        {
            "id": 6,
            "filename": "02-deep-learning-neural-networks.txt",
            "contentType": "text/plain",
            "fileSize": 3598,
            "processingStatus": "COMPLETED",
            "summary": "Deep Learning: Advanced Neural Networks Deep Learning is a specialized subset of machine learning that uses artificial neural networks with multiple layers (deep neural networks) to learn hierarchical...",
            "uploadedAt": "2025-12-04T21:39:01.259023",
            "updatedAt": "2025-12-04T21:39:31.45965"
        },
        {
            "id": 7,
            "filename": "03-natural-language-processing.txt",
            "contentType": "text/plain",
            "fileSize": 4985,
            "processingStatus": "COMPLETED",
            "summary": "Natural Language Processing: Understanding Human Language Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and gene...",
            "uploadedAt": "2025-12-04T21:39:40.227774",
            "updatedAt": "2025-12-04T21:40:25.788378"
        }
    ],
    "count": 3,
    "message": "Documents retrieved successfully"
}

request.description: Retrieve a specific document by its ID

response.name: Get Document by ID
response.body:
{
    "id": 5,
    "filename": "01-machine-learning-introduction.txt",
    "contentType": "text/plain",
    "fileSize": 2200,
    "processingStatus": "COMPLETED",
    "summary": "Machine Learning: An Introduction Machine Learning (ML) is a subset of artificial intelligence that focuses on building systems that can learn from and make decisions based on data.",
    "uploadedAt": "2025-12-04T21:38:16.789968",
    "updatedAt": "2025-12-04T21:38:43.662451"
}

request.description: Retrieve the AI-generated summary for a document

response.name: Get Document Summary

request.description: Retrieve all documents that have summaries generated

request.description: Get processing statistics for all documents including counts by status and completion rates
Retrieve related documents (knowledge graph edges) for a specific document

request.description: Delete a document by its ID
Retrieve top 3 relevant document chunks based on text input using AI-powered semantic search
Search with a custom query. Replace the text in the URL with your search query.
